    <!-- <input type="text" id="phone" value=""/> -->
    <script>
    console.log(countryArrays);


    $(window).on("load", function () {
        var f = document.getElementById("phone").value;
        console.log(f);
        if (!f.includes("+") && f.length > 0 && f.includes(" ")){
        var input = document.querySelector("#phone");
        var codenum=input.value.split(' ')[0];
        codenum=codenum.replace("+","");
        console.log("codenum22222222222222222222222222222222222222222",codenum);
        const searchIndex = countryArrays.findIndex((ph) => ph.iso2 == codenum);
        var c_code = countryArrays[searchIndex].dialCode;
        document.getElementById("phone").value = `+${c_code} ${f}`;
        }

        // const searchIndex = countryArrays.findIndex((ph) => ph.iso2 == sel);
        // var c_code=countryArrays[searchIndex].dialCode;
        //console.log(countryArrays[searchIndex].dialCode);

        if (sel != "" && sel != null ) {
            
        var input = document.querySelector("#phone");
        var codenum=input.value.split(' ')[0];
      
        codenum=codenum.replace("+","");
        const searchIndex = countryArrays.findIndex((ph) => ph.dialCode == codenum);
        console.log("searchindex",searchIndex);
        let c_code = countryArrays[searchIndex].iso2;
        console.log("c_code",c_code);
        window.intlTelInput(input, {
            separateDialCode: false,
            excludeCountries: ["in", "il"],
            preferredCountries: ["tn", "us"],
            initialCountry: c_code ,
        });
        } else {
       // document.getElementById("selectedCountry").value = "tn";
        var input = document.querySelector("#phone");
        window.intlTelInput(input, {
            separateDialCode: false,
            excludeCountries: ["in", "il"],
            preferredCountries: ["tn", "us"],
            initialCountry: "tn",
        });
        }

        //console.log(flag);
        console.log(sel);
        $("#phone").focusout(function () {
        var f = document.getElementById("phone").value;
        f=String(f);
        const searchIndex = countryArrays.findIndex((ph) => ph.iso2 == sel);
        var c_code = countryArrays[searchIndex].dialCode;
        // f.replaceAll(c_code,"");
    
        console.log("f",f);


    console.log(f.split(' ')[0].length);
    
    if(f.includes('+')){
       f = f.substring(f.split(' ')[0].length+1,f.length);

    }
        // var newDick = f.split(' ');
        // console.log("dick=>",newDick);
    
        document.getElementById("phone").value = f!="" && f!=null ? `+${c_code} ${f}`:"";
        
    });
    });
    </script>
